sentences.sentence: All joiners will receive a welcome pack.
sentences.translation: 每位入会者都会收到一个迎新包。

sentences.sentence: They are not quitters but they have become non-joiners.
sentences.translation: 她们不是“半途而废者”，但却变成了“不参与者”。

sentences.sentence: Getting rid of anything that may give rise to inflation is in the self-interest of new joiners.
sentences.translation: 摆脱任何可以引起通胀的因素是新成员的自身利益范围内的事情。
